long_description: Pack a meal in the REI Go Cube cooler to keep your food fresh and organized while you make the morning commute or head out for a hike. Go Cubes are designed to pack neatly inside a backpack, tote or bicycle panniers so you can stay organized while on the go. Sized to fit REI eCycle food containers (sold separately) and other brand containers. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool for hours; foam also protects fruit from bruising. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof and PVC-free; liner wipes clean quickly and easily. Zippered exterior pocket holds utensils and napkins (sold separately). Webbing handle lets you easily transport the REI Go Cube cooler.
short_description: Pack a meal in the REI Go Cube cooler to keep your food fresh and organized while you make the morning commute or head out for a hike.
